item.description:
For change of pace: Packards Library Room- if you go straight to the back is on your right.
This a nice large room where we non-distracting discussion and the ambiance is rather nice.

Discussion Topic:
1. The open source movement, philosophy and accomplishments and global implications- I will add some and
- send links on this topic post in the comment section of your rsvp

2. Others?

Next general meeting we can meet at Smith and do website critiques or internet aided discussion.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: December Web Developers Meet-up General Meeting
